title: League Crashes and Does Not Load In Loading Screen
body:
I lose LP because my team remade the game... I didn't even get to load in.

I has happened 5 times now in ranked games... I just got demoted from Bronze 4 Into Bronze 5 Because of this issue... Please help me... I want bronze 4 back! I should not be demoted to bronze 5!

I am seriously considering quitting league if i dont get bronze 4 back, and if this issue is not fixed soon.

UPDATE: I just reinstalled league, and the issue is still happening

replies.body: I have this problem too. I get to 0% in the loading screen then I get "Unable to connect to server - please check your internet connection and try again" message. I am repairing the game and if it fixes it I will tell you.

This sounds like a network issue, so repairing game files might not really fix this.  You can't connect to the server, so you'll end up in an error message like that.  Go over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to get this fixed up!

I'd like to help but need some more info on what you're experiencing here.  When you say league crashes, can you provide some more details?  For example, does the loading screen appear at all?  What do you see?  Are there any error messages and what does it say?  Until this is resolved, you may want to stick to custom games to troubleshoot.  Let me know!
I got it to work! For some reason, running as administrator works now, but it was not yesterday. Thanks so much man! Well, now im farming back up to bronze 4 :D
http://apollo-na-uploads.s3.amazonaws.com/1436337692/failedtoconnect.png <---- That is the message I get after my screen turns black
It says that, but without all the other stuff just "Unable to connect to the server, please attempt to reconnect to the game"

Thanks for the screenshot!  As I suspected, you're having a network problem trying to connect to our servers.  Reinstalling isn't like to fix this because it's related to your connection and not game files.  Go through each step of our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide, and it should get you fixed up.  Let me know your results afterward!
League is by far my favorite game, so this sucks for me because it took me 2 weeks of playing to get to bronze 4... and I can't play any games right now... :({{item:3070}}

Ok... So as soon as the game goes into the loading screen my whole screen goes black and my mouse turns into a little blue circle. A few seconds after the screen is black, a message pops up saying I need to try to reload the client, and two options are shown "reload" or "cancel" either one I click nothing happens. I then ult tab out, and either close league of legends from the taskbar. When I close League from the taskbar, it brings me back to league, but it says "Your game has crashed, please reload the client" or something along those lines and in the little orange box it says reload. If I click reload, the whole cycle just happens over again. If I click the X button to quit out of league at the top right of the screen, League closes, and then when I turn it back on and log in, the whole cycle happens over again. If I go into task manager, and end all the league tabs, and log back in the cycle just happens over and over again. I have even tried right clicking on the league aplication and "running as administrator" but still I get a black screen... I really want bronze 4 back :(

Having the same issues with the client, when I'm waiting in champion select it crashes, when i go and click the hextech crafting it crashes. Just very annoying that it crashes all the time and i get 5 minute bans for it.
